biotools.summary: Visualize phylogenic trees where each species (node) has a number of reads (quantity) that map on the reference genome of this species. Each species is represented by a rectangle and its area is proportional to the number of assigned reads. The final figure is nested rectangles representing tree branches.

bioschemas.name: MetaTreeMap
bioschemas.summary: Visualize phylogenic trees where each species (node) has a number of reads (quantity) that map on the reference genome of this species. Each species is represented by a rectangle and its area is proportional to the number of assigned reads. The final figure is nested rectangles representing tree branches.
